articles.author: Will Shanklin
articles.title: Apple backtracks on plans to get rid of web apps on iPhones in the EU - Engadget
articles.description: Apple has walked back its decision to remove home screen web apps in the European Union (EU). After initially blaming its decision to ditch them on the...
articles.content: Apple has walked back its decision to remove home screen web apps in the European Union (EU). After initially blaming its decision to ditch them on the Digital Markets Acts (DMA) requirement to suppo… [+2651 chars]
